info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cabarrus, east central Mecklenburg and southeastern Rowan Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Salisbury to 11 miles northeast of Kannapolis to 4 miles northeast of Downtown Concord. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Kannapolis, Downtown Concord, Salisbury, West Concord, Harrisburg, China Grove, Spencer, Landis, Granite Quarry and Rockwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
